item.title: MLOps Fraud Detection
item.description: This pattern demonstrates how Red Hat OpenShift AI can be used to build an end-to-end MLOps platform. It demonstrates this using a credit card fraud detection use case.

item.title: RAG LLM Chatbot on CPU
item.description: This patterns deploys a CPU-based LLM, your choice of several RAG DB providers, and a simple chatbot UI which exposes the configuration and results of the RAG queries.
